info.description: Cactacea / Cactacea backend API for web and mobile applications
info.title: Cactacea backend API

get.summary: Search accounts

parameters.name: display_name
parameters.description: Filters accounts whose display name start of.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Filters accounts which started on since or later.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset of accounts. By default the value is 0.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Maximum number of accounts returned on one result page. By default the value is 20 accounts. The page size can never be larger than 50.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Account identifier.
